page.title: 15Education at Princethorpe
page.content: Princethorpe College comprises a mixture of old and new buildings.There is a church which was built in 1901. The college is approximately 7 miles from Leamington Spa and Coventry. Inside the college are some well_ furnished classrooms.The pupils have to wear a uniform_black blazer,white shirt,house tie,long black trousers,black shoes,grey jumper with red V_neck.There are 40 teachers and c.500 pupils.Each teacher has c.14 pupils per class.Games played include: basket ball,judo hockey,rugby,cricket, cross_country.The College owns 16 computers.Girls are admitted to the Sixth Form.Ghosts are reputed to haunt here.One ghost is half a nun.The school is independent,and is conducted by The Missionaries Of The Sacred Heart.
